channel.title: MILES Software on MILES | Machine Integration and Learning for Earth Systems
channel.description: Recent content in MILES Software on MILES | Machine Integration and Learning for Earth Systems

item.title: ECHO
item.description: ECHO is a Python package for distributed hyperparameter optimization built on the optuna package.

item.title: Hagelslag
item.description: Hagelslag is a Python package for tracking storms in numerical model output, performing machine learning post-processing for severe weather, and performing probabilistic verification. Hagelslag development has been funded by the National Science Foundation and NOAA.
